document.full_text: alien invasion film "battle: los angeles" waged a successful campaign for north american movie supremacy over the weekend, collecting $36 million in a march to the no. 1 spot on box office charts.
document.title: "battle: los angeles" claims box office victory
lines_and_colors: alien invasion film "battle: los angeles" waged a successful campaign for north american movie supremacy over the weekend, collecting $36 million in a march to the no. 1 spot on box office charts.
